report.name: x_stockra

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: SELECT rpad(ra.factpid, 4, ' ') factpid, rpad(ra.pid, 4, ' ') pid, rpad(nvl(to_char(ra.cdeb,'mm/yyyy'),' '),7,' ') cdeb, rpad(nvl(ra.typproj,' '),1,' ') typproj, rpad(nvl(ra.metier,' '),3,' ') metier, lpad(nvl(to_char(ra.codsg),' '),7,'0') codsg, lpad(nvl(to_char(ra.dpcode),'0'),5,'0') dpcode, lpad(nvl(to_char(ra.icpi),'0' ), 5,'0') icpi, rpad(nvl(ra.ecet,' '),2,' ') ecet, rpad(nvl(ra.typetap,' '),2,' ') typetap, rpad(nvl(ra.acta,' '),2,' ') acta, rpad(nvl(ra.acst,' '),2,' ') acst, rpad(nvl(ra.aist,' '),6,' ') aist, rpad(nvl(ra.asnom,' '),15,' ') asnom, lpad(nvl(to_char(ra.cafi),'0'),6,'0') cafi, lpad(nvl(to_char(ra.codsgress),' '),7,'0') codsgress, rpad(nvl(si.libdsg,' '),30,' ') libdpg, lpad(nvl(to_char(ra.codcamo),'0'),6,'0') codcamo, rpad(nvl(ca.CLIBRCA,' '),16,' ') libca, rpad(ra.ident,5,' ') ident, rpad(nvl(ress.rnom,' '),30,' ') rnom, rpad(nvl(ra.rtype,' '),1,' ') rtype, rpad(nvl(ra.prestation,' '),3,' ') prestation, rpad(nvl(ra.niveau,' '),2,' ') niveau, rpad(nvl(ra.soccode,' '),4,' ') soccode, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(ra.coutftht ,0.0), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'), 12, ' ') coutftht, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(ra.coutfthtr ,0.0), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'), 12, ' ') coutfthtr, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(ra.coutenv ,0.0), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'), 12, ' ') coutenv, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(an.consojh_N,0) , 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'), 12, ' ') consojh_an, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(an.consoft_N,0) , 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'), 12, ' ') consoft_an, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(an.consoenv_N,0) , 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'), 12, ' ') consoenv_an, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(ra.consojh ,0.0), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'), 12, ' ') consojh, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(ra.consoft ,0.0), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'), 12, ' ') consoft, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(ra.consoenv ,0.0), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'), 12, ' ') consoenv, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(ra.a_consojh ,0.0), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'), 12, ' ') a_consojh, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(ra.a_consoft,0.0), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'), 12, ' ') a_consoft, lpad (NVL (TO_CHAR(NVL(ra.a_consoenv ,0.0), 'FM9999999990D00','NLS_NUMERIC_CHARACTERS='',.'), '0,0'), 12, ' ') a_consoenv, CHR(13) FROM stock_ra ra, (select ra1.factpid,ra1.ident, ra1.cafi, sum(NVL(ra1.consojh,0)) consojh_N, sum(NVL(ra1.consoft,0)) consoft_N, sum(NVL(ra1.consoenv,0)) consoenv_N from stock_ra ra1 group by factpid,ident,cafi) an , ressource ress, centre_activite ca, struct_info si WHERE ress.ident=ra.ident AND si.codsg=ra.codsgress AND ca.codcamo=ra.codcamo AND ra.ident=an.ident(+) AND ra.factpid = an.factpid(+) AND ra.cafi = an.cafi(+) &P_WHERE ORDER BY ra.factpid,ra.pid,ra.cdeb ;

function.name: afterpform

report.webSource:
<%@ taglib uri="/WEB-INF/lib/reports_tld.jar" prefix="rw" %> <%@ page language="java" import="java.io.*" errorPage="/rwerror.jsp" session="false" %> <%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=ISO-8859-1" %> <!-- <rw:report id="report"> <rw:objects id="objects"> </rw:objects> -->

</body> </html>
